answers.answer: Hi!A dopplar can catch pain or a feeling of warmth due to clots in veins and arteries. If you have pain or tingling sensation or any abnormal sensation in lower extremities especially at night (legs or ankles—which includes pain, cold legs or feet, crawling sensation etc)  then this is usually due to ‘restless leg syndrome’(RLS). Vit B12 deficiency, peripheral neuropathies due to diabetes, hypothyroidism, lupus etc are the other possibilities. It can even be a pinched spinal nerve. Take care!

question: A doppler was done on my left leg which was bothering at the time  but now my right leg bothers me again, what is you insite on this?
title: Doppler Exam
